context_bundle.summary: Multi-agent communication workflow using AutoHotkey for DC→VSCC message delivery. Replaces unreliable file-based and PowerShell SendKeys methods with proven AHK pattern.

onboarding.quick_start: DC→VSCC: 1) Craft message, 2) write_file AHK script with message + target, 3) execute_powershell Start-Process script.ahk, 4) Verify delivery
common_patterns: Message format: 'VSCC - DC TASK: [task description] - DC'
Confirmation: MsgBox on success, file fallback on window not found
Response protocol: VSCC writes to C:\Temp\VSCC_RESPONSE.txt
known_errors: VS Code may not be focused - script handles with WinExist check
Multiple VS Code instances - targets first match
VSCC may be in different project - message still delivered to active window
